articles.title: George W. Bush calls on Americans to confront domestic violent extremists on 9/11 anniversary - CNN
articles.description: Former President George W. Bush on Saturday called on Americans to confront domestic violent extremists, comparing them to violent extremists abroad and warning that they are "children of the same foul spirit."
